T02TD1962E:99b-0: @99b ` // nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02TD1962E:99b-2: ` // dpal gshin rje gshed nag po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1962E:99b-3: gus pa yis ni bla ma yi //
T02TD1962E:99b-5: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1962E:99b-6: nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i //
T02TD1962E:99b-7: mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad //
T02TD1962E:99b-8: dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis //
T02TD1962E:99b-9: dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni //
T02TD1962E:99b-10: stong pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste //
T02TD1962E:99b-12: de'i steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1962E:99b-13: de yi steng du h'um bsams te //
T02TD1962E:99b-14: h'um las 'od byung mdun du ni //
T02TD1962E:99b-15: bla ma mkha' 'gro bzhugs par bsam //
T02TD1962E:99b-16: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byas la //
T02TD1962E:99b-17: sdig bshags la sogs tshogs su 'gyur //
T02TD1962E:99b-18: de nas snying gar h'um las ni //
T02TD1962E:99b-19: 'od byung lus ngag bag chags rnams //
T02TD1962E:99b-20: bsregs nas stong pa nyid du bsgom //
T02TD1962E:99b-21: de ni ye shes tshogs yin no //
T02TD1962E:99b-22: sems ni h'um gi rnam par bsam //
T02TD1962E:99b-23: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur //
T02TD1962E:99b-24: rdo rje las ni sku bskyed do //
T02TD1962E:99b-25: zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog gnag / g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus mthing zhal ;
T02TD1962E:99b-26: / spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02TD1962E:99b-27: dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes //
T02TD1962E:99b-28: gri gug rdo rje ral gri gsum //
T02TD1962E:99b-29: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa yin //
T02TD1962E:99b-31: g-yon pa'i phyag na bsnams pa yin //
T02TD1962E:100a-0: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang gsus po @100a * //
T02TD1962E:100a-2: / lha mo phag mo'i mgul nas 'khyud //
T02TD1962E:100a-3: phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02TD1962E:100a-4: gri gug dang ni bhandha g-yon //
T02TD1962E:100a-5: gtso bo'i mgul nas 'khyud pa'i tshul //
T02TD1962E:100a-6: gnyis su med pa'i gnas na bzhugs //
T02TD1962E:100a-7: mig dang lus sogs dbang po drug / sangs rgyas drug kyang yod par bsam //
T02TD1962E:100a-8: sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1962E:100a-9: snying ga'i h'um las 'od byung bsam //
T02TD1962E:100a-10: ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs te //
T02TD1962E:100a-11: tshig gi dbang yang blang bar bya //
T02TD1962E:100a-12: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
T02TD1962E:100a-13: bcom ldan mnga' bdag chen po rnams //
T02TD1962E:100a-14: khyod kyis bdag la dbang bskur gsol //
T02TD1962E:100a-15: de skad bdag gis dbang blangs pas //
T02TD1962E:100a-16: ye shes rdo rje chu rgyun gyis //
T02TD1962E:100a-17: bdag gi spyi bor dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1962E:100a-18: rigs lnga'i cod pan gyur par bsam //
T02TD1962E:100a-19: mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi bza' //
T02TD1962E:100a-20: de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni //
T02TD1962E:100a-21: bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no //
T02TD1962E:100a-22: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1962E:100a-23: thams cad grub pa'i don du bzlas //
T02TD1962E:100a-24: gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1962E:100a-25: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD1962E:100a-26: a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1962E:100a-27: bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02TD1962E:100a-28: des ni gtor ma sbyin par bya ;
T02TD1962E:100a-29: / de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1962E:100a-30: de nas rnal 'byor ngal bso bya //
T02TD1962E:100a-31: snying ga'i h'um gi 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1962E:100a-32: khams gsum ma lus kun la khyab //
T02TD1962E:100a-33: kun kyang sangs rgyas sku ru 'gyur //
T02TD1962E:100a-34: gyur pa kun kyang bdag la bsdu //
T02TD1962E:100a-35: bdag kyang h'um la bsdus byas la //
T02TD1962E:100a-36: h'um yang thig ler 'gro bar bsgom //
T02TD1962E:100a-37: rtog pa yang dag spangs pa ste //
T02TD1962E:100a-38: yang dag bde ba'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1962E:100a-39: phyag med zhal med kha dog med //
T02TD1962E:100a-40: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1962E:100a-41: 'di byas bsod nams gang thob pas //
T02TD1962E:100a-42: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shog / nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1962E:100a-43: slob dpon la li ta badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
